item.title: Certifications. Learning Tool or Misuse of Human Energy?
item.description: Certifications have always been a controversial topic for me. Theyâ€™re either dismissed as time-wasters or celebrated as career boosters. When people ask me, “Do you recommend certification X? Is it worth pursuing?”, I find myself unsure how to respond. Having gained experience with a few technical certifications (such as OCP and CKAD) as well as language certifications (like IELTS and TELC German), this article is an attempt to break it down and figure this out.
